entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is described as laughing so hard that she let out a scream of mirth and her prominent eyes swam with tears. She is also mentioned to be clutching her sides and rocking backward and forward.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is described as waking up and flapping her wings indignantly when Luna let out a scream of mirth.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is described as leaping up into the luggage rack, hissing when Luna let out a scream of mirth.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned to be looking around at the others and laughing at the expression on Ron's face and at the ludicrously prolonged laughter of Luna Lovegood.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as glancing at the magazine on the floor and noticing something that made him dive for it.

entities.name: baboon
entities.description: Baboon's backside is mentioned in Luna's choked words when she says 'Baboon's . . . backside!'

relationships.description: Hedwig woke up and flapped her wings indignantly when Luna let out a scream of mirth.
Crookshanks leaped up into the luggage rack, hissing when Luna let out a scream of mirth.
Harry noticed something in the magazine that made him dive for it.
